participant_1.background:
I once had a panic attack in front of my entire class.
i collect single malt scotch.
I live in a place with a warm climate where I can keep my iguana.
I sometimes eat candy because it reminds me of my childhood.
i eat out more than three times a week.

participant_2.background:
I read my favorite book Twilight on the beach while on vacation.
i used to work as an actress.
i also dance and sing.
my favorite food is sushi.
I enjoy my quiet life and green tea.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you. I am currently in school studying business.
Oh, that's awesome! What is your favorite class so far?
I love marketing, it's so interesting to learn about how to reach consumers.
That's a good choice! I'm a marketing manager myself.
Oh cool! What kind of company do you work for?
I work for a small, local company that sells sustainable products.
That's awesome! I love supporting small businesses.
Thanks! We're definitely glad for the support.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, dance, and sing. I also used to be an actress, but I don't have much time for it anymore.
That's awesome! I used to dance as well, but I don't have much time for it anymore either.
It's hard to find time for everything, isn't it?
Yeah, it is. But it's worth it to make time for the things we love.
That's a good philosophy to live by.
